thread.title: 2017 costliest year on record for U.S. natural disasters

title: 2017 costliest year on record for U.S. natural disasters

organizations.name: u.s. national oceanic and atmospheric administration

text:
2017 costliest year on record for U.S. natural disasters 1:26am IST - 00:57 
Weather and climate-related disasters cost the United States a record $306 billion in 2017, the third-warmest year on record, the U.S. National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) said on Monday.
